dt-option.name: searchBuilder.logic

type.description: The value for the default logic operator for groups, either `AND` or `OR`.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.logic` option is `AND` meaning that as standard the initial logic applied to groups will be `AND` logic.
dt-option.description:
This option allows for the default logic of all groups to be set when they are initialised. This can take the value of either `AND` or `OR`. As default `AND` logic is used because it is the most predominant form to use when searching a dataset.
When using `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` searches, this value is also used if `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.logic` is not defined in the initialisation.
